mapper.insert: insert into moment(content, img, like_status, author, created_at) values (#{content}, #{img}, #{like_status}, #{author}, current_timestamp)
mapper.update: update moment set content = #{content}, img = #{img}, like_status = #{like_status}, author = #{author}, updated_at = current_timestamp where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from moment where content like #{searchContent} or author like #{searchContent}
